page.title: 01E.Shepshed:W.Loughborough.
page.content: The block is roughly divided into{3} main areas.In the West is{Shepshed,}a thriving village which has expanded over recent years.In the East is a residential region of{Loughborough,} much of which has been built over the last decade.Dividing these communities is the{Garendon Estate,}owned by the {Squire De Lisle.}Much of this is devoted to arable farming,interspersed with mixed woods and plantations. Some light industry and some quarrying is to be found in the Shepshed region. The{Thorpe Acre}and{Dishley}areas of Loughborough have no such industry but can boast a Hypermarket and the campus of{Loughborough University.} The{A512}is the main road linking the two communities;the railway has been dismantled.The{M1}motorway provides the region with an excellent access service in the form of{Junction 23.}
